message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1450000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's well below its true value to you.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1350000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While $1350000 is a good offer, I'm still a bit away from my target price. I'm willing to come down to $1400000. This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it very beneficial.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1375000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
